title: client stops responding
body: On occasion (usually the first game of the day), my client will freeze and when I click on the screen I get an error message telling me that lolclient.exe has stopped responding and gives me two choices.  I can either wait for it to respond (never works), or quit the program.  whichever method I choose I end up dodging the match and losing 3 lp/gaining a 5 minute wait timer.  Any clues on how to fix this?

replies.body: This freezing could be happening for a few reasons, depending on where it's happening and the error.  The most common culprit right now has been due to a recent windows 10 update.  If this is the case for you, disable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been freezing the game for some players.  Let me know if that helps!
